Body: Possible Duplicate:  Why am I getting a “Low on Space” warning and having other weird problems?  I have a HTC wildfire S and have experienced nothing but trouble with this phone and a previous android phone I had. I have personally downloaded 1 app which is moved to the SD card, but my phone keeps coming up with the message mentioned in the title. I cannot open the gallery to delete music (which there is little of) or any pictures, it is also stopping me reading messages I have received. How can I create more free space? The only apps I have are the ones that came when I first got the phone and cannot be moved to my 8gb memory card! Someone please help.
Title: "You don't have enough free space remaining in your phone's storage"

history.Text: I have a HTC wildfire S and have experienced nothing but trouble with this phone and a previous android phone I had.
